text: Pero is a locality near San Lorenzo Della Costa in the comune of Santa Margherita Ligure in the Metropolitan city of Genoa in Liguria in northern Italy.Pdf http://www.caicalco.it/pdf/2018/20180408_Ruta%20Portofino.pdf Viewed on 18/07/2022 == References == Category:Settlements in Genoa
title: Pero, Genoa
